T02D1507:274a-1: shr'i tsa kra sambba ra tatva au pa de sha / bod skad du /
T02D1507:274a-2: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i de kho na nyid kyi
T02D1507:274a-3: man ngag / dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag
T02D1507:274a-4: 'tshal lo // dag pa'i de nyid mtshon pa yi //
T02D1507:274a-5: ae wam sbyor ba las skyes pa //
T02D1507:274a-6: mkha' mnyam dri ma rnam spangs pa'i //
T02D1507:274a-7: dbyer med chos la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1507:274a-8: rgyud rnams kun du ches gsang ba //
T02D1507:274a-9: bla ma rim brgyud las 'ongs nas //
T02D1507:274a-10: ji bzhin bdag gis nges rtogs pa //
T02D1507:274a-11: de 'dir rnam par gsal bar bya //
T02D1507:274a-13: spyod 'tshang gsung gi nyi zer gyis //
T02D1507:274a-14: phye bas legs thob snying po mchog /'gro rnams tshims par byed pa 'di'o //
T02D1507:274a-15: gang du bskal pa grangs med par //
T02D1507:274a-19: lus gdung sems ni g-yeng byed pa'i //
T02D1507:274a-20: dka' thub la sogs rnam spangs te ;
T02D1507:274a-21: /'dod pa nye bar brten pa yi //
T02D1507:274a-22: lam gyis bde ba'i 'bras bu bsgrub //
T02D1507:274a-23: gang zhig brten pas yul kun gyi //
T02D1507:274a-24: bde bas yongs su tshims byed cing //
T02D1507:274a-25: spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras ster ba //
T02D1507:274a-26: mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs ldan pa'o //
T02D1507:274a-27: 'jig rten rtog pas brtags pa yi //
T02D1507:274a-28: rigs kyi zhen pa kun spangs nas //
T02D1507:274a-29: dbyibs dang kha dog long tsho dang //
T02D1507:274a-30: na tshod la sogs rjes mthun zhing //
T02D1507:274a-31: dam tshig spyod pa sogs brten pa'i //
T02D1507:274a-32: yon tan rnams kyi rten gyur pa //
T02D1507:274a-33: brten pas sgrub po dbang phyug gi / dngos grub kun gyi gzhi byed pa'o //
T02D1507:274a-34: legs brtags shin tu legs rtogs pa //
T02D1507:274a-35: brten bya de las gzhan du ni //
T02D1507:274a-36: chags sogs 'jig rten dbang gyur pas //
T02D1507:274a-38: chags can ye shes mngon 'dod pas //
T02D1507:274a-39: tshul 'di nyid kyis bgrod bya yi //
T02D1507:274a-40: de las gzhan pa'i lam gyis ni //
T02D1507:274b-0: nam yang grub la @274b brten mi 'gyur //
T02D1507:274b-1: shin tu dben pa'i sar gnas te //
T02D1507:274b-2: 'jig rten g-yeng ba kun spangs pas //
T02D1507:274b-3: bde ba'i ye shes 'phel byed pa'i //
T02D1507:274b-4: rjes mthun longs spyod brten pa dang //
T02D1507:274b-5: rigs dang yang dag sbyor ba'i sems //
T02D1507:274b-6: mi mnyam bde ba'i rten gyur pa //
T02D1507:274b-7: de 'dir rang gi stobs kyis sam //
T02D1507:274b-8: de bzhin phyag rgya'i stobs kyis kyang //
T02D1507:274b-9: nor bu'i nang son dbyer med pas //
T02D1507:274b-10: bde mchog bla na med goms bya //
T02D1507:274b-11: de goms pa yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1507:274b-12: ras dkar la ni snum dang ni //
T02D1507:274b-13: zas la bcud kyis phug pa dang //
T02D1507:274b-14: chab rom las ni chu nyid dang //
T02D1507:274b-15: chu rnams las kyang rgya mtsho dang //
T02D1507:274b-16: chu rlabs las ni chu bzhin 'gyur //
T02D1507:274b-17: gang zhig mchog tu goms pa'i mthus //
T02D1507:274b-18: sna tshogs snang ba der 'gyur te //
T02D1507:274b-19: ji ltar bu ram las byas gzugs //
T02D1507:274b-20: sna tshogs mngar ba'i ro bzhin no //
T02D1507:274b-21: gang 'dir thun nam nyin gcig gam //
T02D1507:274b-22: zla phyed zla gcig khyud kor du //
T02D1507:274b-23: goms pas bskal mang bye stong du //
T02D1507:274b-24: mi 'gyur pa yi ye shes thob //
T02D1507:274b-25: 'khor lo sdom dpal gzhung lugs las //
T02D1507:274b-26: bla ma'i dran gyis legs thob pa //
T02D1507:274b-27: de 'dir bdag gis gsal byas pas //
T02D1507:274b-28: dge des 'gro kun bla med shog / dpal 'khor
T02D1507:274b-29: lo sdom pa'i de kho na nyid kyi man ngag
T02D1507:274b-30: ku sa li pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1507:274b-33: // / kha che'i mkhas pa bha dra bo dhi dang /
